text: Theodora Nathalia "Tonie" Nathan (February 9, 1923 - March 20, 2014) was an American politician. She is the first woman, as well as the first Jewish person, to have got an electoral vote in a United States presidential election. She was the 1972 vice presidential nominee of the Libertarian Party and running mate of John Hospers. She was born in New York City. Nathan died from Alzheimer's disease on March 20, 2014 in Eugene, Oregon. She was 91 years old. ==References== ==Other websites== * Tonie Nathan biography Category:1923 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from Alzheimer's disease Category:Disease-related deaths in Oregon Category:Jewish American politicians Category:Jewish politicians Category:Politicians from New York City Category:Libertarian Party (United States) politicians
title: Tonie Nathan
